mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') AS period, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS uniqueUserCount FROM request_info WHERE request_code = 'L' AND create_date >= CONCAT(#{fromMonth}, '-01') AND create_date < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{toMonth}, '-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY period

SELECT DATE(create_date) AS period, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS uniqueUserCount FROM request_info WHERE request_code = 'L' AND create_date >= #{fromDate} AND create_date < DATE_ADD(#{toDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(create_date) ORDER BY period
